TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit InputLanguage extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供方法和字段以管理输入语言。

span.span: Provides methods and fields to manage the input language.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 输入语言是一种区域性/键盘布局对，用于确定键盘上的物理键映射到语言中的字符的方式。An input language is a culture/keyboard layout pair that determines how the physical keys on a keyboard map or plot to characters in a language. 输入语言基于 Windows 输入法区域设置标识符（例如，平台 SDK 函数返回的） `GetKeyboardLayout`。The input language is based on a Windows input locale identifier, such as that returned by the Platform SDK function, `GetKeyboardLayout`. 输入区域设置标识符也称为键盘布局（HKL）值的句柄。The input locale identifier is also called a handle to a keyboard layout (HKL) value. 使用提供的 `static` 方法查找所有已安装的系统映射，并更改线程或进程的输入语言。Use the `static` methods provided to find all installed mappings of the system and to change the input language for a thread or process. 调用 以获取当前输入语言。Call to get the current input language. 为默认输入语言调用 。Call for the default input language. 调用 以获取此系统中所有已安装的语言。Call to get all the installed languages in this system. 列出了所有已安装的语言后，请使用 将当前输入语言更改为另一种语言。After you have a list of all the installed languages, use to change the current input language to a different language. ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取已安装语言的列表。The following code example gets a list of installed languages. 该示例要求 `textBox1` 已经实例化并且 `textBox1.MultiLine` 已设置为 `true`。The example requires that `textBox1` has been instantiated and that `textBox1.MultiLine` has been set to `true`. [!code-cpp[Classic InputLanguage Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic InputLanguage Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic InputLanguage Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic InputLanguage Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic InputLanguage Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic InputLanguage Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下一个示例将默认输入语言设置为当前输入语言。The next example sets the default input language as the current input language. 该示例要求 `textBox1` 已经实例化并且 `textBox1.MultiLine` 已设置为 `true`。The example requires that `textBox1` has been instantiated and that `textBox1.MultiLine` has been set to `true`. [!code-cpp[Classic InputLanguage Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic InputLanguage Example/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic InputLanguage Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic InputLanguage Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic InputLanguage Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic InputLanguage Example/VB/source.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage FromCulture(class System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture) cil managed
Public Shared Function FromCulture (culture As CultureInfo) As InputLanguage

span.span: The that specifies the culture to convert from.

summary.span: 返回与指定区域性关联的输入语言。

span.span: Returns the input language associated with the specified culture.
An that represents the previously selected input language.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从安装的键盘中进行选择。The method selects from among installed keyboards. 具体而言，此方法执行以下操作：Specifically, this method performs the following operations: 1. 获取与 `culture`关联的 LCID。Gets the LCID associated with `culture`. 2. 从 `GetKeyboardLayoutList` 函数获取可用输入语言标识符（HKLs）的完整列表。Gets the full list of available input language identifiers (HKLs) from the `GetKeyboardLayoutList` function. 3. 查找与 `culture`中的 LCID 相对应的 HKL （如果存在）。Finds the HKL that corresponds to the LCID from `culture`, if one is present. 4. 返回与该 HKL 关联的已安装键盘。Returns the installed keyboard associated with that HKL. 5. 如果找不到键盘，将返回 `null`。If no keyboard is found, returns `null`. > [!NOTE] > 如果尚未为 `culture`安装其他键盘， 方法从不尝试加载或安装其他键盘。The method never tries to load or install an additional keyboard if one has not already been installed for `culture`. 使用平台 SDK 功能 `LoadKeyboardLayout`来安装其他键盘。Use the Platform SDK function, `LoadKeyboardLayout`, to install an additional keyboard. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将默认输入语言设置为当前输入语言。The following code example sets the default input language as the current input language. 首先，调用 以获取系统默认语言。First, is called to get the system default language. 接下来，调用 以获取当前输入语言。Next, is called to get the current input language. 结果将打印在文本框中。The results are printed in a text box. 然后，通过默认输入语言调用 会将当前输入语言更改为默认语言。Then, calling with the default input language changes the current input language to the default. 新的当前输入语言显示在文本框中。The new current input language is displayed in a text box. 此代码假定已实例化 `textBox1`。This code assumes that `textBox1` has been instantiated. [!code-cpp[Classic InputLanguage.FromCulture Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic InputLanguage.FromCulture Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic InputLanguage.FromCulture Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic InputLanguage.FromCulture Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic InputLanguage.FromCulture Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic InputLanguage.FromCulture Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取当前的输入语言。The following code example gets the current input language. 然后，它调用 以获取句柄，并将结果输出到文本框中。Then it calls to get the handle and prints the results in a text box. 该示例要求 `textBox1` 已实例化。The example requires that `textBox1` has been instantiated. [!code-cpp[Classic InputLanguage.Handle Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic InputLanguage.Handle Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic InputLanguage.Handle Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic InputLanguage.Handle Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic InputLanguage.Handle Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic InputLanguage.Handle Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property InstalledInputLanguages As InputLanguageCollection

summary.span: 获取所有已安装输入语言的列表。

span.span: Gets a list of all installed input languages.

value.span: 对象的数组，这些对象表示计算机上安装的输入语言。

span.span: An array of objects that represent the input languages installed on the computer.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例检索安装在计算机上的所有输入语言，并显示其名称。The following code example retrieves all the input languages installed on the computer and displays their names. 此代码调用 以获取已安装的语言。The code calls to get the installed languages. 文本框显示语言名称的列表。A text box displays the list of language names. 此代码假定已对 `textBox1` 进行了实例化，并且 `textBox1.MultiLine` 已设置为 `true`。This code assumes that `textBox1` has been instantiated and that `textBox1.MultiLine` has been set to `true`. [!code-cpp[Classic InputLanguage.InstalledInputLanguages Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic InputLanguage.InstalledInputLanguages Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic InputLanguage.InstalledInputLanguages Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic InputLanguage.InstalledInputLanguages Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic InputLanguage.InstalledInputLanguages Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic InputLanguage.InstalledInputLanguages Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 在当前键盘布局名称出现在计算机操作系统的区域设置中时获取该名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the current keyboard layout as it appears in the regional settings of the operating system on the computer.
The name of the layout.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取与当前输入语言关联的区域性，并显示区域性名称。The following code example gets the culture associated with the current input language and displays the culture name. 首先，调用 以获取当前输入语言。First, is called to get the current input language. 然后，调用 以获取此输入语言的区域性信息。Then, is called to get the culture information for this input language. 最后，检索 ，并将其显示在文本框中。Finally, is retrieved and displayed in a text box. [!code-cpp[Classic InputLanguage.LayoutName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic InputLanguage.LayoutName Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic InputLanguage.LayoutName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic InputLanguage.LayoutName Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic InputLanguage.LayoutName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic InputLanguage.LayoutName Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
